title: Wanted!  T206 American Beauty Eddie Collins
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: Wanted!  T206 American Beauty Eddie Collins
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I am looking for an American Beauty Eddie Collins.  If you have one, let me know.  We can discuss sale or trade options.  I know a board member sold one last fall and I missed buying that one because I was a little short at the time.  I really want this card!
Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

Just a quarterly bump since things are slow in the T section.
Still looking for a AB 350 Eddie Collins.  Willing to buy or trade.  I know someone has this little feller!
Thanks for the help,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
